channel.title: Jira on SATHEE
channel.description: Recent content in Jira on SATHEE

item.title: Jira
item.description: How to Open a Project: Step 1. Enter the project name in search bar Step 2. Press the enter key. How to Select Project Board Step 1. Go to planning option then, Step 2. Go to board section Step 3. select your board according to the Agile framework How to get high level view of Project(Roadmap) Step 1. Go planning section, Step 2. Click on Roadmap, In this section one can get the highlevel view of a Project Issue Every low level task in JIRA is considered an issue.
